name: Bouncy Ninja - The Original
description:
Bouncing Ninja is not as easy as it seems... Jump in the tiny spaces between the black spikes, and don't touch the top or bottom lines!

[HOW TO PLAY]
- Tap the screen to make the Ninja jump!
- Help the Ninja avoid the deadly spikes!
- Keep him alive for as long as possible!

Collect COINS and customize your character in the SHOP!!

Have fun and compare your high score with your friends!
